author: andrew_cleal
title: Odd offering from 1972.
review:
This tractor was available between 1972 and 1974. I have always thought of it as a bit of an 'oddity' as it is a completely different 'scale' to most of the other vehicles Lego were putting out at the time.
 
It has a steering mechanism which turns the front wheels from the steering wheel. this is basically a couple of components with groooves cut into them, and does not seem to work all that well, but then we are talking about 36 year-old bits of plastic!
 
It does come in a very nice period box.
